channel.title: Mage splashing

item.title: Mage splashing
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Alright, this does work, but it only works if the bonuses are like 500-700â€¦ And still, it hits, but rarely.

public int CheckBestBonus(int ID) {
client p  = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
if ((p.playerName != null || p.playerName != "null")) {
if(p.playerBonus[6] > p.playerBonus[7] && p.playerBonus[6] > p.playerBonus[8])
return 6;
if(p.playerBonus[7] > p.playerBonus[6] && p.playerBonus[7] > p.playerBonus[8])
return 7;
if(p.playerBonus[8] > p.playerBonus[6] && p.playerBonus[8] > p.playerBonus[7])
return 8;
else
return 0;
}
return 0;
}

Is it the return types?.. Do i need to lower or higher, to make it splash, when bonus is about 200-300?

And also, can someone explain what those return types mean? return 6; return 7; return 8; ?..

What is it returning?

Many thanks.

Read full topic
